name: The Sync
description:
Game made for startup Cities 2020 Game Jam

Controls:

  • Arrow keys - move character 1
  • W A S D keys - move character 2 
  • Backspace - restart level
  • S or down key - ladder down

Programms we've used:

  • Godot game engine
  • Aseprite
  • GIMP
  • MS Paint
  • Tiled
  • Sfxr
  • Bosca.ceoil
  • Audacity

Fonts we've used aren't ours.

Platforms:

Game is avaible for :

  • Windows
  • Mac
  • Linux
  • Web
